title: How do I respond to someone who says ‘I’m not racist, but ... ’? | Leading questions
summary: Advice columnist Eleanor Gordon-Smith emphasizes the importance of expressing disagreement for both personal growth and the benefit of others. She suggests that individuals should first clarify their goals before engaging in discussions. This approach can lead to more productive and meaningful conversations.

title: Trump officials announce sweeping immigration reviews after national guard shooting
summary: After a recent attack, Donald Trump indicated that he would intensify scrutiny on refugee and asylum cases. He suggested that such measures are necessary to ensure national security. The remarks reflect ongoing concerns about immigration policies in the context of safety.

title: Canada minister resigns from cabinet over Carney’s controversial oil pipeline deal
summary: Minister Steven Guilbeault stated that Indigenous nations were not consulted regarding the pipeline project. He emphasized that the pipeline could lead to significant environmental consequences. The lack of consultation raises concerns over Indigenous rights and environmental protection.
